channel.title: Tidytuesday on Jake Kaupp
channel.description: Recent content in Tidytuesday on Jake Kaupp

item.title: #TidyTuesday:The lonesome kicker
item.description: I do not update this site as much as I would like. Interacting through twitter and the #R4DS slack channel has been my main contributions as of late to being more active in the #rstats community. I make plans to get to things like posting, then end up with other work, a neat idea, or just decide spend time with my family. Worthy endeavors all of them. Anyways, Thomas Mock (@thomasmock), has started up #tidytuesday out of the mentorship pilot program in #R4DS.
